item.title: [ 82] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases
State BUDGET and COUNTRY or you will NOT be helped
Building guide: https://wiki.installgentoo.com/index.php?title=Build_a_PC&diff=55476&oldid=55400

>CASE
mATX: AP201, Lian Li A3, O11 Air Mini, XT M3
ATX: XT PRO (ULTRA), AIR 903 Base/MAX, Lancool 207, Flux Pro, Y40, Meshify 3, 4000D FRAME
Dual Chamber: Y60/70, Vision (Compact), Antec C8

>CPU
Budget (inc. gaming): 7500F, 7600/X, 9600/X
Gaming: 9800X3D, 7800X3D, 9700/X, 7700/X
Workstation: 9950X, 9900X
Premium: 9950X3D
Intel: If deeply discounted (13/14th gen -K CPU BIOS update required)

>COOLER
AIO: Thermalright Frozen Edge, Cooler Master Atmos, Liquid Freezer 3/Pro (unhandy mounting solution)
Dual tower: A620 PRO SE, Peerless Assassin 120 SE V3, NH-D15 G2
ITX/>42mm RAM: Mugen 6 Dual Fan, AXP120-X67

>MOTHERBOARD
ASRock AM5 board issues are still reported; BIOS must be updated before CPU installation

>RAM
DDR5: 2x16GB or 2x24GB, 6000CL30 (AMD), 6400CL32 (Intel)
Workstation/high end: consider 2x32GB or 2x64GB

>SSD (OS drive)
Budget: SN580, SN770
High end: SN850X, 990 Pro (Windows)
Premium: SN8100
https://borecraft.com/

>GPU
Budget: Arc B580, used card
Mid range: RX 9060 XT 16GB, 5060Ti 16GB
High-performance 1440p & Mid-range 4K: RX 9070 XT
Workstation: RTX 5090, used 4090 or 3090 Ti

>PSU
Budget: Corsair CX
PSU buying guide:
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>MONITOR
1080p: KTC H24T09P
1440p: Acer XV271U M3, KTC M27T6 (miniLED)
4K: Gigabyte M27UA/M27UP, Samsung Neo G8 (miniLED), ASUS PG32UCDM (QD-OLED), PG32UCDP (WOLED)

>OS
Activate Windows @ >>> >>105822033

>CASE FANS
Meta: Case with good stock PWM fans
Mid-range: Arctic P12 Pro, P14 (Max) (5-pack)
High end: Noctua NF-A12x25 G2, Noctua NF-A14x25 G2

Prev: >>105852927

item.title: [ 81] WHISTLEBLOWER EMAILS EXPOSE FRESH TRUMP ABUSES IN ABREGO GARCIA CASE
item.description:
Newly released communications show the lengths the Trump administration went to in order to label Kilmar Abrego Garcia an MS-13 leader.

Emails provided to Congress by a whistleblower and 15-year veteran of the Justice Department reveal that administration officials went to striking lengths to prop up the claim that Kilmar Abrego Garcia was a ‚Äúleader‚Äù of the MS-13 gang‚Äîeven as President Trump was coming under intense pressure to return him from El Salvador after wrongfully deporting him.

The emails‚Äîwhich The New Republic obtained in advance of their scheduled release Thursday‚Äîdeepen our understanding of the adminisration‚Äôs extraordinary mishandling of Abrego Garcia‚Äôs case. They show in fresh detail how officials sought to create the impression that Abrego Garcia was a dangerous criminal before having any evidence to back up the claim, which has since proven to be unsupported.

The emails were provided to Congress by Erez Reuveni, a 15-year veteran of the Justice Department who was fired this spring after expressing doubts in court about the rendition of Abrego Garcia to CECOT, El Salvador‚Äôs notorious megaprison. Abrego Garcia‚Äîwho had been living in Maryland under a form of protected status granted by an immigration judge in 2019‚Äîwas deported on March 15 due to an admitted ‚Äúerror.‚Äù

But Trump refused to bring Abrego Garcia back to the United States for months‚Äîeven defying a Supreme Court order to ‚Äúfacilitate‚Äù his return‚Äîand justified all this largely by citing his supposed MS-13 status. The administration finally brought him back in early June, only to bring new criminal charges against him for smuggling migrants.

https://newrepublic.com/article/197793/kilmar-abrego-garcia-whistleblower-emails-expose-trump-abuses

Original filename: 1720971017507928.png

item.title: [155] This is a general thread for people to post their AI art and/or make requests f
item.description:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art and/or make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pok√©mon-related gens.

NovelAI v4.5 is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Midjourney is a paid AI generator, also capable of video. Usage requires a monthly subscription, with basically infinite gens.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL¬∑E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‚Äòbuzz‚Äô currency. You get a certain amount every day, plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg
>>>/g/ldg
Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Tensor is another generator that gives free daily credits, as well as a vast library of LoRAs to train your prompts on. Subscriptions are available for those who wish to pursue more than this.
>https://tensor.art/

Pastebin of Pok√©mon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm

Characters with under 50 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pok√©mon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool. (Ask him for updated versions or more Nai4 tools)
>mega .nz/file/67xwTRSB#m0fPUmJRaWd3oh47gt6nw2LKNMe820TaiKdXTAhx8tI

Previous Thread: >>57979177

Original filename: 0bd088d2fbed6510e6b198d195a5163ad1c468aa.png

item.title: [455] /nfl/ General - Adultery Edition
item.description:
NFL ‚Äì The NFLPA has appealed a collusion ruling regarding fully guaranteed contracts, sending the case to a three-member panel.

LAR ‚Äì Rams RB coach says Kyren Williams looks ‚Äúmore explosive‚Äù and should remain the team‚Äôs lead back.

DEN ‚Äì Marvin Mims is pushing for WR2 duties behind Sutton after leading the team in deep catches last year.

ATL ‚Äì Bijan Robinson says the Falcons have ‚Äúoutlandish‚Äù rushing goals and plans for heavy usage in 2025.

TB ‚Äì Bucs LT Tristan Wirfs (knee) is expected to miss at least the first few games of the regular season.

PHI ‚Äì Will Shipley is being closely evaluated as a potential replacement for Kenneth Gainwell‚Äôs former role.

TEN ‚Äì Titans plan to better balance touches between Tony Pollard and Tyjae Spears this season.

HOU ‚Äì Christian Kirk is emerging as a go-to target and ‚Äúslot demon‚Äù in Houston‚Äôs offense behind Nico Collins.

CIN ‚Äì The Bengals and Trey Hendrickson have resumed contract talks, though he‚Äôs still prepared to hold out.

DET ‚Äì Jameson Williams could be traded in 2026 if no extension is reached, despite expected big role this season.

Original filename: 1612934564053.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 67] FRLG appreciation thread
item.description:
I think FRLG is the best Pokemon game ever (tied with Platinum and HGSS).

Sure, FRLG is not the most content-packed game because Emerald, Platinum, HGSS and BW2 all have more content than FRLG overall. But FRLG has some things that just make it special and unique. Like for example:
>Sevii Islands: an amazing island archipelago that cannot be experienced outside of FRLG
>Trainer Tower (there's a similar battle facility in Emerald called Trainer Hill, but it's not exactly the same, and FRLG's version is better)
>Fame Checker
>VS Seeker (shared with DPPt/BDSP)
>Trainer Card customization
>Selphy's requests
>Etc.

Furthermore, there's also something unique about FRLG's art style and visual presentation, that most other Pokemon games lack: wonderful details like the location preview feature, Teachy TV, the reminder of what you did before saving, etc. These are all things that enhance the overall game experience that we barely ever see in other Pokemon games.

But also, there are other more obvious reasons why I like FRLG so much: FRLG Red is my favorite player character design in the series, Charizard is my favorite starter, Kanto is one of my favorite regions, and I love the music too. I feel like all of these things combined create a fantastic experience for the player.

Thank you for reading, and please share your opinions about FRLG with me. Is it one of your favorite games too? Or do you have other favorites?

For me it's: FRLG = Platinum = HGSS > the rest

Original filename: 1_67553001-16dd-46b4-bc6e-9b5fa74b1662.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 58] I enjoyed it. It was laggy, but it was fun
item.description:
The kalos megas looked nothing like what were described, delphox would sit on its broom not stand on it. Greninja would be upside down during animations but normally it would remain the same

Mega dragonite and skarmory and scolipede were my favourites.
I chose Emboar it sucked I didnt like its mega evolution.

No one seemed to talk about goodra, theres a hard battle against it near the end. Zygarde looked alot different than described it has giant ultimate weapon flower when it mega evolves and its face has some xerneas antlers mixed with yveltals clouds.

Diantha does return but you dont battle her you only do PR videos. There is a sidequest for a special form of Porygon. Its not a mega or regional form but it can corrupt trainer's cellphones sometimes throughout the story. You can evolve it into porygon-z, which is electric/dark. Its almost like a virus, but it was created, so its not a normal regional form.

The post game lets you catch xerneas and yveltal and mewtwo can mega evolve. There is a trainer who says she is related to zinnia but does nothing.

Original filename: 2wemb.webm
item.author: darle78

item.title: [148] Why do so many adult men refuse to eat vegetables? So many guys I know will onl
item.description:
Why do so many adult men refuse to eat vegetables? So many guys I know will only eat green if it's a piece of lettuce on a cheeseburger. My FIL literally called asparagus and broccoli "absolutely disgusting" like he was a toddler. He calls salads rabbit food or food that food eats. No he's not healthy at all, a salad would definitely do him some good. It's weird because you can look at movies or documentaries from the 50s or earlier and people ate a ton of veggies. They'd have a small piece of meat or fish, some potatoes and at least 2-3 servings or more veggies at the table. But it's becoming increasingly common for people to just avoid veggies entirely. Is this just some picky eating thing? I don't understand how risking colon cancer is seen as manly.

Original filename: adult-man-refuses-eat-vegetables-with-hand_99043-1415.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [131] Democrats told to "get shot" for the anti-Trump resistance
item.description:
At town halls in their districts and in one-on-one meetings with constituents and activists, Democratic members of Congress are facing a growing thrum of demands to break the rules, fight dirty ‚Äî and not be afraid to get hurt.

Why it matters: House Democrats told Axios they see a growing anger among their base that has, in some cases, morphed into a disregard for American institutions, political traditions and even the rule of law.

"This idea that we're going to save every norm and that we're not going to play [Republicans'] game ... I don't think that's resonating with voters anymore," said one House Democrat.

Another told Axios that a "sense of fear and despair and anger" among voters "puts us in a different position where ... we can't keep following norms of decorum."

Axios spoke to more than two dozen House Democrats for this story, with many requesting anonymity to offer candid insights about their interactions with constituents and activists.

https://www.axios.com/2025/07/07/democrats-trump-resistance-violence-congress

Original filename: awtwtat4.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 36] What treat from your childhood has shrinkflation ruined?
item.description:
Gen X kid here, growing up it was a huge treat to get a can of Ray's Coney Island sauce for our hotdogs. When you opened the can there was a half inch of seasoned grease with dark red sauce filled with very finally minced beef below it. After heating it up and putting that on your hotdog it was elevated to new levels of flavor. I bought a can over a year ago I have been saving for a special day to enjoy some Coney Island dogs. Well I decided that day is today. I opened the can to find a wholly different product inside. Gone was the half inch of seasoned grease. Gone was the dark red sauce with finely minced beef. It was replaced by a boring homogeneous brown sauce that looked like the racial make up of the west in two more generations. Gone was the delicious greasy spiced flavor. It was replaced by something that reminded me of shitty Hormel canned chili. Another treasured treat from my childhood gone so some corporate fat cat can save half a penny on every can produced.

Original filename: 1722099085559146.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 98] More leftwing terrorism: 10 arrested for trying to murder ICE agents
item.description:
https://www.foxnews.com/us/texas-police-officer-shot-near-ice-detention-center-trump-officials-promise-zero-tolerance

Planned ambush at Texas ICE facility leaves officer shot, as 10 charged with attempted murder, authorities say
Alvarado police officer shot while responding to suspicious person call near Prairieland Detention Facility

The shooting of a Texas police officer near a U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) detention facility and the firing of shots at federal officers over the weekend was a "planned ambush" on the building, resulting in 11 people being charged, authorities said Monday.

An Alvarado, Texas, police officer was shot Friday night near the Prairieland Detention Facility, authorities said.

"This was an egregious attack on federal and local law enforcement officers and it is part of an increasing trend of violence against them," said Nancy Larson, acting U.S. Attorney for the Northern District of Texas.

Original filename: peaceful insurrection.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 40] Texas's Camp Mystic confirms 27 children and counsellors died in floods
item.description:
https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/jul/07/texas-floods-summer-camp-death-toll-victims
https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/climate-energy/death-toll-texas-floods-reaches-78-trump-plans-visit-2025-07-06/
Camp Mystic, the girls summer camp on the banks of the Guadalupe River in Texas, has confirmed that 27 children and counsellors died in the flash floods that have wreaked devastation on the area since Friday.

‚ÄúOur hearts are broken alongside our families that are enduring this unimaginable tragedy. We are praying for them constantly,‚Äù a statement on the camp website read.

The search continued for missing people, it said, adding: ‚ÄúWe ask for your continued prayers, respect and privacy for each of our families affected.‚Äù

Original filename: camp mystic.png

item.title: [236] /jpg/ - Japan General
item.description:
School Rooftop Edition

„Éº How do I travel by public transportation? „Éº
Use Google Maps within cities, install the Jorudan or Navitime app for intercity travel

„Éº What should I see in <place>? „Éº
https://www.wikivoyage.org/
https://www.japan-guide.com/
https://www.jnto.go.jp/
>Solid general guides - sights, sample itineraries, pre-travel considerations, etc
https://www.google.com/maps/d/edit?mid=1fmfaySQHmojbRGKWCwRecq6Ln1Bb2Xdh&ll=35.67928012473078%2C139.68638283648374&z=12
*You should check on google if a place is still in business before you plan to visit it*

„ÉºMake your trip more comfortable with Hands Free Travel service„Éº
YAMATO TRANSPORT Hands-Free Travel
>https://www.global-yamato.com/en/hands-free-travel/?_gl=1*1kpsw68*_gcl_au*Mjg5NzUwNDI0LjE3NTA4OTU0ODY.
SAGAWA EXPRESS Hands-Free Travel
>https://www.sagawa-exp.co.jp/hands-freetravel/english/

„ÉºTravel insurance: Better safe than sorry„Éº
https://www.jnto.go.jp/emergency/eng/do_travel_insurance05.html

„ÉºJR Pass„Éº
Since JR has adjusted the prices for the pass, not really worth it anymore, unless you want to travel by train very extensively. You can plug in your itinerary in the links below and compare prices to the JR Pass.
>https://japantravel.navitime.com/en/area/jp/route/
>https://world.jorudan.co.jp/mln/en/
With the increased price of the JR Pass, local train passes might be good deals now.
>https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e2357.html

New prices starting June 2025
>7 day Pass: ¬•50,000
>14 day Pass: ¬•80,000
>21 day Pass: ¬•100,000
https://www.japan-guide.com/railpass/

„ÉºInfo on Degeneracy „Éº
READ THE INFO LISTED HERE. STOP TALKING ABOUT IT IN THE THREAD.

>https://chn.cityheaven.net/
>https://rockitrisingsun.com
>https://paradise-tokyo.net
>https://hentaitokyo.com
>https://tokyoadultguide.com/
